update salary_position_job set sal_position_ceo=#{sal_position_ceo}, sal_position_vice=#{sal_position_vice}, sal_position_director=#{sal_position_director}, sal_position_depart=#{sal_position_depart}, sal_position_team=#{sal_position_team}, sal_position_manager=#{sal_position_manager}, sal_position_assist=#{sal_position_assist}, sal_position_staff=#{sal_position_staff}, sal_job1=#{sal_job1}, sal_job2=#{sal_job2}, sal_job3=#{sal_job3}, sal_job4=#{sal_job4}, sal_job5=#{sal_job5}, sal_job6=#{sal_job6}, sal_job7=#{sal_job7}, sal_job8=#{sal_job8}, sal_job9=#{sal_job9}, sal_job10=#{sal_job10} where sal_position_job_id=1
select * from salary_list order by sal_list_id desc
select * from salary_list where sal_type = #{sal_type} and year= #{year} and month=#{month} limit 1

select e.emp_id, emp_name, dname, dgrade, perform_rate, emp_position, emp_job, emp_work_type, sum(working_time) working_time, sum(overtime) overtime, sum(night_work_time) night_work_time, sum(special_working_time) special_working_time from employee e, attendance_ch a, dept d where e.emp_id = a.emp_id and e.emp_dnum = d.dnum and e.emp_id = #{emp_id} and check_in between #{check_in } and concat(last_day(#{check_in}), ' 23:59:59')

select e.emp_id, emp_name, dname, emp_position, emp_job, emp_work_type, sum(working_time) working_time, sum(overtime) overtime, sum(night_work_time) night_work_time, sum(special_working_time) special_working_time from employee e, attendance_ch a, dept d where e.emp_id = a.emp_id and e.emp_dnum = d.dnum and check_in between #{check_in } and concat(last_day(#{check_in}), ' 23:59:59') group by e.emp_id

insert into salary_list(sal_list_id, year, month, sal_type, sal_list_subject, sal_list_date, sal_list_status) values(#{sal_list_id}, #{year}, #{month}, #{sal_type}, #{sal_list_subject}, now(), '임시저장')

insert into salary_final(sal_list_id, emp_id, emp_name, dname, dgrade, perform_rate, bonus_rate, emp_position, emp_job, emp_work_type, sal_position, sal_job, sal_allow, sal_month, sal_total_basic, sal_perform, sal_bonus, sal_total_before, incometax, pension, heal_ins, long_ins, emp_ins, sal_total_deduct, sal_total_after) values(#{sal_list_id}, #{emp_id}, #{emp_name}, #{dname}, #{dgrade}, #{perform_rate}, #{bonus_rate}, #{emp_position}, #{emp_job}, #{emp_work_type}, #{sal_position}, #{sal_job}, #{sal_allow}, #{sal_month}, #{sal_total_basic}, #{sal_perform}, #{sal_bonus}, #{sal_total_before}, #{incometax}, #{pension}, #{heal_ins}, #{long_ins}, #{emp_ins}, #{sal_total_deduct}, #{sal_total_after} )
delete from salary_list where sal_list_id = #{sal_list_id}
delete from salary_final where sal_list_id = #{sal_list_id}
update salary_list set sal_list_status = '최종확정' where sal_list_id = #{sal_list_id}
select * from salary_final where sal_list_id = #{sal_list_id}
select year, month, sal_type from salary_list where sal_list_id = #{sal_list_id}

select f.emp_id, sal_final_id, f.sal_list_id, sal_type, year, month, sal_total_before, sal_total_deduct, sal_total_after from salary_final f, salary_list l where f.sal_list_id = l.sal_list_id and year=#{year} and emp_id=#{emp_id} order by emp_id desc, year desc, CAST(month AS UNSIGNED) DESC

select f.emp_id, sal_final_id, f.sal_list_id, sal_type, year, month, sal_total_before, sal_total_deduct, sal_total_after from salary_final f, salary_list l where f.sal_list_id = l.sal_list_id and year=#{year} and emp_name=#{emp_name} order by emp_id desc, year desc, CAST(month AS UNSIGNED) DESC

select emp_id, emp_name, emp_position, emp_job, emp_work_type, year, month, sal_type, sal_position, sal_job, perform_rate, dname, dgrade, bonus_rate, sal_month, sal_perform, sal_bonus, sal_allow, incometax, pension, heal_ins, long_ins, emp_ins, sal_total_basic ,sal_total_before, sal_total_deduct, sal_total_after from salary_final f, salary_list l where f.sal_list_id = l.sal_list_id and sal_final_id=#{sal_final_id}
